turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'd like to check my current balance.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! Please provide the last four digits of the account you'd like to check.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, it's 1234. Also, can you tell me the last three transactions?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance:
One moment... Your current balance is $2,578.23. The last three transactions are as follows:

*   July 26: Payment to Netflix, -$19.99
*   July 27: Deposit from Employer, +$1,800.00
*   July 28: Payment to Grocery Store, -$75.32

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Great, thanks. Actually, I'm a bit confused. I thought I had a recurring payment set up for my rent, but it doesn't seem to be listed.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am sorry, I am not able to look into and tell you about reoccuring payments. Please log into your online banking and check your recurring payments and payment dates there.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, that's frustrating. Okay, well, can I change the payment limit on my debit card?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, you can. To increase or decrease the daily spending limit on your debit card, please provide the desired new limit. Also, what is the last four digits of your debit card?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I'd like to set it to $1000, and my card number is 5678. That should be it, thanks for your help.
